title: Parliament to meet at 10 AM on Wednesday (18)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Parliament will convene at 10.00 AM today (18) under the auspices of the Speaker.
The adjournment motion debate on the recent chain of events in the country is scheduled to be held today (18) as well.
Meanwhile, the security on roads around Parliament has also been tightened.
Gang of Pohottuwa MP’s harass Journalists in P’ment; grab phones
